0.text: No History - a charge has not been initiated yet

3.text: Task terminated due to stop switch being toggled

4.text: Task terminated due to an open circuit error|5=Task terminated due to Wrong Batt or Hi-imp|6=Task terminated due to an over-temperature error|7=Amp-hour capacity test result OK|8=Amp-hour capacity test error|9=Task terminated due to low charge slope error|10=Task terminated due to power error|11=Task terminated due to reverse-polarity error|12=Task terminated due to a short-circuit error|13=Task terminated due to a time-out error|14=Task terminated due to an external-temperature error|15=Discharge|16=Wait on Discharge|17=Wait on Charge

5.text: Task terminated due to Wrong Batt or Hi-imp

6.text: Task terminated due to an over-temperature error

9.text: Task terminated due to low charge slope error

10.text: Task terminated due to power error

11.text: Task terminated due to reverse-polarity error

12.text: Task terminated due to a short-circuit error

13.text: Task terminated due to a time-out error

14.text: Task terminated due to an external-temperature error
